name: Unoffensible Demo
summary:
VR RTS
A classic RTS in VR where all projectiles and units have simulated physics. Move your units by throwing. Stack units to increase their power.

Features
Build for VR only. With unique VR interactions
Campaign/Story driven RTS focus on single player
Physics based. All projectiles, enemies, friendlies and neutral items can be grabbed by the player
RTS basics : Fog of war, Tech tree, Base building, Superweapons, Resources, Cutscenes, many weapons & many enemies

Current state of DEMO
The demo is of...
